name: Outdoor Research Whiskey Peak Beanie - Unisex
description: A microfleece ear-band keeps ears happy, while the wool construction keeps the Whiskey Peak Toque breathable. To top it off, the OR vintage patch adds just a touch of TBT flare.Made of warm, soft lamb's wool for cozy warmth.Polyester microfleece lining is super-comfy against the skin.
